header.text: My friend Maui - a bit very clumsy ragdoll cat. I am a little jealous of his naps during the day, but You know what? I wouldn’t switch with him! I like biking and short trips to the mountains with my boyfriend too much.

education.title: Education
education.text: I graduated design studies at the University of Science and Technology and Academy of Fine Arts. Studying at such different universities let me to look at design from different perspectives. I easily combine beautiful and useful.

data.title: Design master's studies
data.text: Academy of Fine Arts in Katowice

data.title: Design bachelor studies
data.text: UTP University of Science and Technology in Bydgoszcz

data.title: Graphic communication Co-worker IKEA
data.text: presenting the IKEA offer by graphic communication, informing customers about marketing campaigns, planning and implementing customer guidance, sales supporting by emphasizing the benefits of products, implementation of commercial lighting, using large format printers and cutting plotters, triaining IKEA Co-workers in interpersonal communication.

data.title: Graphic Designer X-5 Productions (creative agency)
data.text: creating event scenery based on license graphics and Key Visuals (Disney, WARNER BROS, Hasbro, Nickelodeon, Animaccord, HiT Entertainment) creating posters, banners, leaflets, textile walls, roll-ups, creating advertising campaigns for shopping malls visualizations of advertising gadgets.

data.title: Graphic Designer - voluntering The Polish Scouting and Guiding Association (ZHP)
data.text: Logo & design of the „Zuchowe Wieści” magazine

volunteering.title: Volunteering
volunteering.text:
For many year I used to be a Scout Guide of The Polish Scouting and Guiding Association. I was the head of a team of leaders, I organized courses and workshops, but what I remember the best were summer camps with the Brownies group, I was the leader of.

In those days I learned to work in a group and I convinced many times that everything is achievable with a well-coordinated team.
